body:
The EP Solution Lead Manager is part of JTI’s Global IT team and will be working in cross-functional international teams, together with the customer and internal or external service providers, for delivering solutions that meet business objectives.

MAIN RESPONSIBILITIES
The position holder will: 
- provide expertise in Emerging Products e-commerce PHP based SaaS applications/processes
- manage technical integration with other JTI IT systems on premises and cloud based systems
- manage and coordinate development operations and effective performance of the business solutions (technical support/maintenance)
- be technical expert in the specific approved projects
- work closely with other internal IT teams and external vendors in order to ensure incidents resolutions and applications enhancements

REQUIREMENTS
• University degree in Information Technologies (e.g. Computer Science, Software Engineering and Automation, Cybernetics or Applied Mathematics)
• Minimum 3 years experience in PHP web based solutions development/configuration
• Good level of PHP/MySQL programming skills
• Experience in working and/or coordinating (virtual/outsourced) software development teams and/or services
• Very good written and spoken English

• Magento configuration/development, Atlassian stack (Jira, Confluence, GitHub, BitBucket) usage experience are a plus
• Knowledge/experience on software development lifecycle methodologies, defining and rolling out software development standards/processes are a plus
• Knowledge/experience with project management and quality assurance methodologies are a plus
title: Emerging Products (EP) Solution Lead Manager
locations: Blvd.Dimitrie Pompei 9-9A sect.2, București, Municipiul București, România
